[zest.releaser.prereleaser.before]
pyfits.prereleaser.before = pyfits._release:releaser.prereleaser_before

[zest.releaser.postreleaser.before]
pyfits.postreleaser.before = pyfits._release:releaser.postreleaser_before

[zest.releaser.prereleaser.after]
pyfits.prereleaser.after = pyfits._release:releaser.prereleaser_after

[zest.releaser.postreleaser.after]
pyfits.postreleaser.after = pyfits._release:releaser.postreleaser_after

[zest.releaser.releaser_after]
pyfits.releaser.after = pyfits._releaser:releaser.releaser_after
